languages.text: {n}Неожиданно лейтенант Вент снова оказывается на пути карателей. Ее лицо напоминает восковую маску, глаза расширены от страха, но губы упрямо сжаты в линию.{/n} "Хотите вырезать всех в Четвертом Складочном — начинайте с меня!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Неожиданно лейтенант Вент снова оказывается на пути карателей. Ее лицо напоминает восковую маску, глаза расширены от страха, но губы упрямо сжаты в линию.{/n} "Хотите вырезать всех в Четвертом Складочном — начинайте с меня!"

languages.text: {n}Suddenly, Lieutenant Vent stands in the executioners' path once again. Her face resembles a wax mask and her eyes are wide with fear, but her lips are clamped into a firm line.{/n} "If you want to mow down everyone in Depot 4, you can start with me!"
languages.original_text: {n}Неожиданно лейтенант Вент снова оказывается на пути карателей. Ее лицо напоминает восковую маску, глаза расширены от страха, но губы упрямо сжаты в линию.{/n} "Хотите вырезать всех в Четвертом Складочном — начинайте с меня!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Suddenly, Lieutenant Vent stands in the executioners' path once again. Her face resembles a wax mask and her eyes are wide with fear, but her lips are clamped into a firm line.{/n} "If you want to mow down everyone in Depot 4, you can start with me!"

{n}Suddenly, Lieutenant Vent stands in the executioners' path once again. Her face resembles a wax mask and her eyes are wide with fear, but her lips are clamped into a firm line.{/n} "If you want to mow down everyone in Depot 4, you can start with me!"

{n}Suddenly, Lieutenant Vent stands in the executioners' path once again. Her face resembles a wax mask and her eyes are wide with fear, but her lips are clamped into a firm line.{/n} "If you want to mow down everyone in Depot 4, you can start with me!"

{n}Suddenly, Lieutenant Vent stands in the executioners' path once again. Her face is pale and her eyes are wide with fear, but her lips are clamped into a firm line.{/n} "If you want to mow down everyone in Depot 4, you can start with me!"

languages.text: {n}突然之间，温特中尉再次挡在了执法者面前。她的脸宛如蜡质面具一般，恐惧地瞪大了眼睛，但嘴唇却紧紧地抿成了一条线。{/n}“如果您打算杀光四号货栈所有人，那就从我开始吧！”
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, Lieutenant Vent stands in the executioners' path once again. Her face resembles a wax mask and her eyes are wide with fear, but her lips are clamped into a firm line.{/n} "If you want to mow down everyone in Depot 4, you can start with me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}突然之间，温特中尉再次挡在了执法者面前。她的脸宛如蜡质面具一般，恐惧地瞪大了眼睛，但嘴唇却紧紧地抿成了一条线。{/n}“如果您打算杀光四号货栈所有人，那就从我开始吧！”

languages.text: {n}De repente, la teniente Vent se vuelve a interponer en el camino de los verdugos. Su rostro parece una máscara de cera y sus ojos traicionan su miedo, pero aprieta los labios con firmeza.{/n} «¡Si queréis fusilar a todo el depósito 4, empezad conmigo!».
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, Lieutenant Vent stands in the executioners' path once again. Her face resembles a wax mask and her eyes are wide with fear, but her lips are clamped into a firm line.{/n} "If you want to mow down everyone in Depot 4, you can start with me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}De repente, la teniente Vent se vuelve a interponer en el camino de los verdugos. Su rostro parece una máscara de cera y sus ojos traicionan su miedo, pero aprieta los labios con firmeza.{/n} «¡Si queréis fusilar a todo el depósito 4, empezad conmigo!».

languages.text: {n}突然、ヴェント副官が再び処刑人の行く手に立ちはだかった。彼女の顔はまるで蝋人形のようで、目は恐怖で大きく見開かれているが、唇は固く結ばれている。{/n}「第四倉庫の全員を殺戮したいのなら、手始めに私を殺すといい！」
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, Lieutenant Vent stands in the executioners' path once again. Her face resembles a wax mask and her eyes are wide with fear, but her lips are clamped into a firm line.{/n} "If you want to mow down everyone in Depot 4, you can start with me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}突然、ヴェント副官が再び処刑人の行く手に立ちはだかった。彼女の顔はまるで蝋人形のようで、目は恐怖で大きく見開かれているが、唇は固く結ばれている。{/n}「第四倉庫の全員を殺戮したいのなら、手始めに私を殺すといい！」

languages.text: {n}Lieutenant Vent stellt sich dem Hinrichtungskommando plötzlich wieder in den Weg. Ihr Gesicht gleicht einer Maske aus Wachs und ihre Augen sind vor Angst weit aufgerissen, doch ihre Lippen sind zu einer festen Linie zusammengepresst.{/n} "Wenn Ihr alle in Depot 4 niedermähen wollt, könnt Ihr mit mir anfangen!"
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, Lieutenant Vent stands in the executioners' path once again. Her face resembles a wax mask and her eyes are wide with fear, but her lips are clamped into a firm line.{/n} "If you want to mow down everyone in Depot 4, you can start with me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Lieutenant Vent stellt sich dem Hinrichtungskommando plötzlich wieder in den Weg. Ihr Gesicht ist blass und ihre Augen sind vor Angst weit aufgerissen, doch ihre Lippen sind zu einer festen Linie zusammengepresst.{/n} "Wenn Ihr alle in Depot 4 niedermähen wollt, könnt Ihr mit mir anfangen!"

languages.text: {n}Subitement, la lieutenante Vent s'interpose à nouveau entre les exécuteurs et les ouvriers. Le teint cendreux, les traits figés et les yeux écarquillés d'effroi, elle serre les lèvres d'un air déterminé.{/n} « Si vous voulez massacrer tout le monde au dépôt 4, vous n'avez qu'à commencer par moi ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, Lieutenant Vent stands in the executioners' path once again. Her face resembles a wax mask and her eyes are wide with fear, but her lips are clamped into a firm line.{/n} "If you want to mow down everyone in Depot 4, you can start with me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Subitement, la lieutenante Vent s'interpose à nouveau entre les exécuteurs et les ouvriers. Le teint cendreux, les traits figés et les yeux écarquillés d'effroi, elle serre les lèvres d'un air déterminé.{/n} « Si vous voulez massacrer tout le monde au dépôt 4, vous n'avez qu'à commencer par moi ! »

languages.text: {n}Teğmen Vent, bir kez daha infazcıların karşısına dikiliyor. Yüzü, bal mumundan bir maskeyi andırıyor, gözleri korkudan büyürken dudakları dümdüz bir çizgide buluşuyor.{/n} "4. Depo'daki herkesi biçecekseniz önce beni geçmeniz gerekecek!"
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, Lieutenant Vent stands in the executioners' path once again. Her face resembles a wax mask and her eyes are wide with fear, but her lips are clamped into a firm line.{/n} "If you want to mow down everyone in Depot 4, you can start with me!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Teğmen Vent, bir kez daha infazcıların karşısına dikiliyor. Yüzü, bal mumundan bir maskeyi andırıyor, gözleri korkudan büyürken dudakları dümdüz bir çizgide buluşuyor.{/n} "4. Depo'daki herkesi biçecekseniz önce beni geçmeniz gerekecek!"
